casebody.data:
Monday, November 1, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

98-2439. Ricker v. John Deere Ins. Co.

Franklin App. No. 97APE11-1505. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to continue oral argument currently scheduled for November 3,1999,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to continue oral argument be, and hereby is, granted.
